name: woocommerce-gateway-precisionpay
description: PrecisionPay Payments for WooCommerce is the official PrecisionPay payment gateway for WooCommerce. This plugin uses Plaid (https://plaid.com/) along with the PrecisionPay checkout portal to allow your customers to pay with PrecisionPay as a guest (using Plaid) or as a PrecisionPay user (if they already have an account at myprecisionpay.com).
